We (internally) created a DynamicTestSuiteBuilder that builds up the suite based on the directory that it is packaged in..."The test runner will run all tests in the package directory and in any subdirectories."

It is based on extending a common class.  It is possible that a similar construct could be done in your environment to distinguish between "all Db tests" and "all non-Db tests", depending on how you make that distinction.

Dianne
